alert.note: Alert for Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 12 at 3:26AM EST until January 13 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Berkshire County. In New York, Eastern Columbia County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 8 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will occur in higher terrain areas, and along north and west facing slopes.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
